description.text: Contains time series data and references to time series data to discover and semantically describe them along the asset lifecycle.
Enthält Zeitreihendaten und Referenzen auf Zeitreihendaten, um diese entlang des Asset Lebenszyklus aufzufinden und semantisch zu beschreiben.

value.value:
from(bucket: "basyx")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PFC200-BOX")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "basyx_host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "PFC-BOX/Environmental/CO2Level" or r["topic"] == "PFC-BOX/Environmental/Humidity" or r["topic"] == "PFC-BOX/Environmental/Temperature")

definition.text: unique global identification of the product using an universal resource identifier (URI)

legally valid designation of the natural or judicial person which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into circulation
Short description of the product (short text)
Top level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy
2nd level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy
Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants
By manufactures issued unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device for ordering
unique product identifier of the manufacturer
unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device once it has been manufactured
Year as completion date of object
Date from which the production and / or development process is completed or from which a service is provided completely
Version of the hardware supplied with the device
Version of the firmware supplied with the device
Version of the software used by the device
Country where the product was manufactured
A graphic mark used to represent a company, an organisation or a product
Collection of product markings
Group of properties that are listed on the asset's nameplate and are grouped based on guidelines
common name of the marking
alphanumeric character sequence identifying a certificate or approval
Date, at which the specified certificate is issued
Date, at which the specified certificate expires
conformity symbol of the marking
where applicable, additional information on the marking in plain text, e.g. the ID-number of the notified body involved in the conformity process
contains information related to explosion safety according to device nameplate
classification according to the standard or directive to which the approval applies
certificates and approvals pertaining to general usage and compliance with constructional standards and directives
classification of an explosion protection according to the specific measures applied to avoid ignition of a surrounding explosive atmosphere
from the manufacturer for the capital assets limited isolation with given(indicated) operating conditions
designation used to uniquely identify a control/reference drawing stored in a file system
Note: X if any, otherwise no entry
U if any, otherwise no entry
Contains properties which are related to the ambient conditions of the device.
Contains properties which are related to the process conditions of the device.
specifies the parameters of external electrical circuits.
category of device in accordance with directive 94/9/EC
part of a hazardous area classification system indicating the likelihood of the existence of a classified hazard
Marking used only in specific regions, e.g. North America: class/divisions, EAC: “1” or NEC: “AIS”
classification of dangerous gaseous substances based on their ability to cause an explosion
lower limit of the temperature range of the surrounding space in which the component, the pipework or the system can be operated
upper limit of the temperature range of the surrounding space in which the component, the pipework or the system can be operated
maximum permissible surface temperature of a device used in an explosion hazardous area with combustible dust
lowest temperature to which the wetted parts of the equipment can be subjected without permanent impairment of operating characteristics
highest temperature to which the wetted parts of the device may be subjected without permanent impairment of operating characteristics
classification system of electrical apparatus, based on its maximum surface temperature, related to the specific explosive atmosphere for which it is intended to be used
alphanumeric character sequence identifying an electrical terminal
Characteristic of the intrinsically safe circuit
FISCO certified intrinsically safe fieldbus circuit (IEC 60079-11)
2-WISE certified intrinsically safe circuit (IEC 60079-47)
properties characterizing the safety related parameters of a loop-powered, intrinsically safe input or output circuit
properties characterizing the safety related parameters of an intrinsically safe circuit
maximum power that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum voltage (peak a.c. or d.c.) that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum current (peak a.c. or d.c) that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum equivalent internal capacitance of the apparatus which is considered as appearing across the connection facilities
maximum equivalent internal inductance of the apparatus which is considered as appearing across the connection facilities
maximum electrical power that can be taken from the apparatus
maximum voltage (peak a.c. or d.c.) that can occur at the connection facilities of the apparatus at any applied voltage up to the maximum voltage
maximum current (peak a.c. or d.c.) in the apparatus that can be taken from the connection facilities of the apparatus
maximum capacitance that can be connected to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum value of inductance that can be connected to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection

maximum value of ratio of inductance (Lo) to resistance (Ro) of any external circuit that can be connected to the connection facilities of the electrical apparatus without invalidating intrinsic safety
Asset specific nameplate information required by guideline, stipulation or legislation.
guideline, stipulation or legislation used for determining conformity
X if any, otherwise no entry
U if any, otherwise no entry
The SMC “ContactInformation” contains information on how to contact the manufacturer or an authorised service provider, e.g. when a maintenance service is required
function of a contact person in a process
code of a country
Available language
offsets from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
town or city
name of the company
administrative section within an organisation where a business partner is located
Phone number including type
complete telephone number to be called to reach a business partner
characterization of a telephone according to its location or usage
Specification of the available time window
Fax number including type
complete telephone number to be called to reach a business partner's fax machine
characterization of the fax according its location or usage
E-mail address and encryption method
electronic mail address of a business partner
public part of an unsymmetrical key pair to sign or encrypt text or messages
characterization of an e-mail address according to its location or usage
characterization of a public key according to its encryption process
ContactInformation/IPCommunication IP-based communication channels, e.g. chat or video call
web site address where information about the product or contact is given
characterization of an IP-based communication channel
street name and house number
ZIP code of address
P.O. box number
ZIP code of P.O. box address
federal state a part of a state
surname of a contact person
first name of a contact person
middle names of contact person
common, formal, religious, or other title preceding a contact person's name
academic title preceding a contact person's name
additional information of the contact person
Collection of explosion safety specifications
horizontal distance between the left-hand and right-hand extremes of a device when standing in its normal position of use
Horizontalabstand zwischen der linken und rechten Seite eines Geräts in seiner normalen Benutzungsstellung
vertical distance between the top and bottom of a device when standing in its normal position of use
Vertikalabstand zwischen Ober- und Unterseite eines Geräts in seiner normalen Benutzungsstellung
horizontal distance between the front and back of an object when standing in its normal position of use or the distance from a surface down to a specific point below the surface of an object

Horizontalabstand zwischen der Vorder- und Rückseite eines Objekts in seiner normalen Benutzungsstellung oder der Abstand von einer Oberfläche nach unten zu einem speziellen Punkt unter der Oberfläche eines Objekts
mass of a device or component in operating state
Masse eines Geräts oder einer Komponente in funktionsfähigem Zustand
distance between two points
Distanz zwischen zwei Punkten
range of the voltage supported: min V - max V
Bereich der unterstützten Spannung: ( V min - max V)
scalar quantity given by the surface integral of the (vector) current density through a given directed surface
skalare Größe, gegeben durch das Flächenintegral der (vektoriellen) Stromdichte durch eine gerichtete Oberfläche

Formula symbol U, potential difference between 2 points of an electrostatic field. The electrical voltage is the cause of the electrical current that flows through a conductor, current and voltage correlate with the resistance of the conductor as a result of Ohm's law. The unit of voltage is Volt

Formelzeichen U, Potenzialdifferenz zwischen 2 Punkten eines elektrostatischen Feldes. die elektrische Spannung ist die Ursache des elektrischen Stromes, der durch einen Leiter fließt, Strom und Spannung hängen durch das Ohmsche Gesetz mit dem Widerstand des Leiters zusammen. die Einheit der Spannung ist das Volt
derivative with respect to time t of energy E being transferred or transformed
zeitliche Ableitung der Energie nach der Zeit, die übertragen oder umgeformt wird
The Submodel “ContactInformations” is the collection for various contact information.
Identification of the domain in which the given DocumentId is unique. The domain ID can e.g., be the name or acronym of the providing organisation
Identifikation der Domäne, in der die angegebene DocumentId eindeutig ist. Die Domain-ID kann z. B. der Name oder das Akronym der bereitstellenden Organisation sein
alphanumeric character sequence uniquely identifying a document
alphanumerische Zeichenfolge, die ein Dokument eindeutig identifiziert

Flag indicating that a DocumentId within a collection of at least two DocumentId`s is the ‘primary’ identifier for the document. This is the preferred ID of the document (commonly from the point of view of the owner of the asset)

Flag, das angibt, dass eine DocumentId innerhalb einer Sammlung von mindestens zwei DocumentIds die „primäre“ Kennung für das Dokument ist. Dies ist die bevorzugte ID des Dokuments (üblicherweise aus Sicht des Eigentümers des Assets)
Unique ID of the document class within a ClassficationSystem
Eindeutige ID der Dokumentenklasse innerhalb eines ClassificationSystems
classification of a document according to its purpose or the information it contains
Charakterisierung eines Dokuments bezüglich des Zwecks oder der Information, die es beinhaltet
Identification of the classification system
Identifikation des Klassifikationssystems
language style of the document
Sprachstil des Dokuments
Information elements of individual VDI 2770 DocumentVersion entities
Informationselemente einzelner VDI 2770 DocumentVersion Entitäten
name of the document
Name des Dokuments
List of language-dependent subtitles of the Document
Liste der sprachabhängigen Untertitel des Dokuments
plain text characterizing the content of the document
Klartext, der den Inhalt des Dokuments kennzeichnet
List of language-dependent keywords of the document
Liste der sprachabhängigen Schlüsselwörter des Dokuments
Date when the document status was set
Datum, an dem der Dokumentenstatus gesetzt wurde

Each document version represents a point in time in the document life cycle. This status value refers to the milestones in the document life cycle. The following two values should be used for the application of this guideline: InReview (under review), Released (released)

Jede Dokumentversion repräsentiert einen Zeitpunkt im Dokumentlebenszyklus. Dieser Statuswert bezieht sich auf die Meilensteine ​​im Dokumentenlebenszyklus. Für die Anwendung dieser Richtlinie sollten die folgenden zwei Werte verwendet werden: InReview (in Überprüfung), Released (freigegeben)
Organiziation name of the author of the document
Name der Organisation des Autors des Dokuments
Official name of the organization of author of the document
Offizieller Name der Organisation des Autors des Dokuments
Forms a generic RefersTo-relationship to another Document or DocumentVersion. They have a loose relationship
Bildet eine generische RefersTo-Beziehung zu einem anderen Dokument oder einer anderen Dokumentversion. Sie haben ein lockeres Verhältnis

Forms a BasedOn-relationship to another Document or DocumentVersion. Typically states, that the content of the document bases on another document (e.g. specification requirements). Both have a strong relationship

Bildet eine BasedOn-Beziehung zu einem anderen Dokument oder einer anderen Dokumentversion. Gibt typischerweise an, dass der Inhalt des Dokuments auf einem anderen Dokument basiert (z. B. Spezifikationsanforderungen). Beide haben eine starke Beziehung
Forms a TranslationOf-relationship to another Document or DocumentVersion. Both have a strong relationship
Bildet eine TranslationOf-Beziehung zu einem anderen Dokument oder einer anderen Dokumentversion. Beide haben eine starke Beziehung
type of the additional document which is oriented towards the mime type used in the Internet
Typ des Zusatzdokuments, der sich an den im Internet verwendeten Mime-Typen orientiert
Path of the document
Pfad des Dokuments
Each SubmodelElementCollection describes a document by standard, which is associated to the particular Asset Administration Shell
Jede SubmodelElementCollection beschreibt ein Dokument (siehe IEC 82045-1 und IEC 8245-2), das der jeweiligen Asset Administration Shell zugeordnet ist
Set of document identifiers for the Document. One ID in this collection should be used as a preferred ID
Satz von Dokument-IDs für das Dokument. Eine ID in dieser Sammlung sollte als bevorzugte ID verwendet werden
Set of information for describing the classification of the Document according to ClassificationSystems
Satz von Informationen zur Beschreibung der Klassifizierung des Dokuments gemäß Klassifizierungssystemen
Information elements of individual Document Version entities
Informationselemente einzelner VDI 2770 DocumentVersion Entitäten
MIME-Type, file name and file contents given by the file SubmodelElement
MIME-Typ, Dateiname und Dateiinhalt, die von der Datei SubmodelElement vorgegeben werden
Provides a preview image of the Document Version, e.g. first page, in a commonly used image format and low resolution
Liefert ein Vorschaubild der DocumentVersion, z.B. erste Seite, in einem gängigen Bildformat und niedriger Auflösung.
Number of documents (handover documentation)
Anzahl der Dokumente (Übergabedokumentation)
timestamp that indicates, when the last/current value was recorded
Zeitstempel, der angibt, zu welchem Zeitpunkt der letzte/aktuelle Wert erfasst wurde
A set of data describing and providing information about the time series
Eine Reihe von Daten, welche die Zeitreihe beschreiben und über sie Auskunft geben
Meaningful name for labeling
Aussagekräftiger Name zur Beschriftung
Short description of the time series
Kurze Beschreibung der Zeitreihendaten
A time series record is unique by its ID within the time series and contains the timestamps and variable values referenced to the ID. Similar to a row in a table

Ein Zeitreihen-Datensatz ist durch seine ID innerhalb der Zeitreihe eindeutig und beinhaltet die auf die ID referenzierten Zeitstempel und Variablenwerte. Vergleichbar mit einer Zeile in einer Tabelle
Contains segments of a time series
Enthält Segmente einer Zeitreihe
Reference to an endpoint of data points in sequential order over a period of time
Referenz auf einen Endpunkt von Datenpunkten in aufeinanderfolgender Reihenfolge über einen bestimmten Zeitraum
Meaningful name for labeling.
Aussagekräftiger Name zur Beschriftung.

preferredName.text: Description of the time series segment

definition.text: Short description of the time series segment.
Kurze Beschreibung des Zeitreihensegments.
Indicates how many records are present in a segment.
Gibt an, wie viele Datensätze in einem Segment vorhanden sind.
Contains the first recorded timestamp of the time series segment and thus represents the beginning of a time series. Time format and scale corresponds to that of the time series.
Enthält den ersten aufgezeichneten Zeitstempel des Zeitreihensegments und stellt somit den Anfang einer Zeitreihe dar. Zeitformat und -skala entspricht dem der Zeitreihe.
Contains the last recorded timestamp of the time series segment and thus represents the end of a time series. Time format and scale corresponds to that of the time series.
Enthält den letzten aufgezeichneten Zeitstempel des Zeitreihensegments und stellt somit das Ende einer Zeitreihe dar. Zeitformat und -skala entspricht dem der Zeitreihe.
Period covered by the segment, represented according to ISO 8601 by the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S
Zeitraum den das Segment umfasst, dargestellt nach ISO 8601 durch das Format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S
The time period between two time series records (Length of cycle).
Der zeitliche Abstand zwischen zwei Datenpunkten (Länge eines Zyklus).
Defines the number of samples per second for a regular time series in Hz.
Definiert die Anzahl der Abtastungen pro Sekunde für eine regelmäßige Zeitreihe in Hz.
State of the time series related to its progress
Zustand der Zeitreihe bezogen auf ihren Fortschritt
Time of the last change
Zeitpunkt der letzten Veränderung
Specifies a location of a resource on an API server through which time series can be requested
Gibt einen Standort einer Ressource auf einen API-Server an, über den Zeitreihen angefragt werden können
generic query component to read time series data from an API
generische Abfrage zum Lesen von Zeitreihen-Daten aus einer API
Value for the ratio of the actual pressure of the steam in the atmosphere and of the saturation steam pressure
Wert für das Verhältnis des tatsächlichen Druckes des Wasserdampfes in der Atmosphäre und des Sättigungsdampfdruckes
temperature of the surrounding operating environment of a component or system, determined at the time under consideration
im betrachteten Zeitpunkt ermittelte Temperatur des umgebenden Raumes, in dem das Bauteil das Leitungssystem oder die Anlage arbeitet
The concentration of carbon dioxide gas in a given volume of air, representing the amount of CO2 present in the air
Die Konzentration von Kohlendioxidgas in einem bestimmten Luftvolumen, die die in der Luft vorhandene CO2-Menge angibt
